entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or rain beginning in the morning then changing to rain near noon and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
